bike.description: Full ultra-high modulus carbon fiber, FEA optimized, NearNet molded, impact-resistant resin binder, Omniad fiber lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin seat stays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis Xenith SL level, ultra-high modulus carbon fiber, NearNet molded, high impact resin binding system, FEA optimized layup, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey WCS Carbon Drop-In, sealed bearing, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Shimano Dura Ace C35 tubular wheelset, 16/20H, 35mm aero full carbon rims, Dura Ace front & rear hubset, bladed spokes
Vittoria Corsa Evo CX, 700 x 21c, tubular
Shimano Dura Ace RD-7900 rear and Dura Ace FD-7900 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Dura Ace ST- 7900 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
Ritchey Superlogic Carbon Logic II, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey WCS C-260JAMIS_DEGREE, 3D net forged 7050 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Ritchey Superlogic Carbon 1-bolt, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Aspide Racing Team with Microfeel cover and Xsilite Rails
